long_description: The Brunton O.S.S. 10B compass draws on a legacy of classic baseplate compasses with no frill or fuss-just reliable and user-friendly navigation to help keep your adventure on the right course. Orbital navigation helps eliminate confusion by using a single color and reducing parallax. Transparent baseplate makes it easy to navigate with a map. Tool-free declination adjustment allows easy reading and convenient navigating. The Brunton O.S.S. 10B compass features 2deg resolution, a lanyard and scales in both in. and mm.
short_description: The Brunton O.S.S. 10B compass draws on a legacy of classic baseplate compasses with no frill or fuss-just reliable and user-friendly navigation to help keep your adventure on the right course.
